named-query.name: getAllTasksEvents
named-query.query: select t from TaskEventImpl t where t.taskId = :taskId

named-query.name: getAllTasksEventsByProcessInstanceId
named-query.query: select t from TaskEventImpl t where t.processInstanceId = :processInstanceId

named-query.name: deleteTaskEventsForTask
named-query.query: delete from TaskEventImpl t where t.taskId = :taskId

named-query.name: DeleteTaskVariableForTask
named-query.query: delete TaskVariableImpl where type = :type and taskId = :taskId

named-query.name: getAllBAMTaskSummaries
named-query.query: select b from BAMTaskSummaryImpl b where b.taskId = :taskId

named-query.name: deleteBAMTaskSummariesForTask
named-query.query: delete from BAMTaskSummaryImpl b where b.taskId = :taskId

named-query.name: getAllAuditTasks
named-query.query: select t from AuditTaskImpl t order by t.taskId DESC

named-query.name: getAllAuditTasksByStatus
named-query.query: select t from AuditTaskImpl t where t.actualOwner = :owner and t.status in :statuses order by t.taskId DESC

named-query.name: getAllAuditTasksByUser
named-query.query: select t from AuditTaskImpl t where t.actualOwner = :owner order by t.taskId DESC

named-query.name: getAllGroupAuditTasksByUser
named-query.query: select distinct t from AuditTaskImpl t, TaskImpl ti join ti.peopleAssignments.potentialOwners pos where (t.actualOwner = null or t.actualOwner = '') and t.status = 'Ready' and ti.id = t.taskId and pos.id in :potentialOwners order by t.taskId DESC

named-query.name: getAllAdminAuditTasksByUser
named-query.query: select distinct t from AuditTaskImpl t, TaskImpl ti join ti.peopleAssignments.businessAdministrators bas where ti.id = t.taskId and bas.id in :businessAdmins order by t.taskId DESC

named-query.name: getAuditTaskById
named-query.query: select t from AuditTaskImpl t where t.taskId = :taskId
